title: 85/188/EEC: Commission Decision of 28 February 1985 amending Commission Decision 82/62/EEC of 18 December 1981 authorizing the United Kingdom to grant exemptions from Council Regulation (EEC) No 543/69 on the harmonization of certain social legislation relating to road transport (Only the English text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 28 February 1985
amending Commission Decision 82/62/EEC of 18 December 1981 authorizing the United Kingdom to grant exemptions from Council Regulation (EEC) No 543/69 on the harmonization of certain social legislation relating to road transport
(Only the English text is authentic)
(85/188/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Commission Decision 82/62/EEC of 18 December 1981 is hereby amended as follows:
In Article 2, '31 December 1985' is substituted for '31 December 1984'.
This Decision is addressed to the United Kingdom Government.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 28 February 1985.
For the Commission
Stanley CLINTON DAVIS
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 77, 29. 3. 1969, p. 49 (for codified version see OJ No C 73, 17. 3. 1979, p. 1).
(2) OJ No L 29, 6. 2. 1982, p. 15.
